display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (REM): (Apneas with >= 4% oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and with >= 4% oxygen desaturation used and with or without arousal) / hours of REM sleep from type I polysomnography
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas in rapid eye movement sleep (REM) associated with >= 4% desaturation) / (hours of rapid eye movement sleep (REM))]
calculation: 60*(hrembp4 + hrop4 + carbp4 + carop4 + oarbp4 + oarop4 + marbp4 + marop4) / minremp
